message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique opportunity to own a valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. This is a great deal, considering its worth is no less than $1200000 to me. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. I'm not sure if it's worth the full $1000000 to me, and I'd like to save some money.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $950000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm not willing to go much lower than that, so I hope we can meet in the middle.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to lower the price to $900000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me. I hope we can come to an agreement at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $900000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000. I'm not willing to go much lower than that, so I hope we can meet in the middle.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I still need to get a bit closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900000 and $875000. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $887500. This is the best I can do.
